verses.plain: O LORD, rebuke me not in thy wrath: neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.

tokens.t: O
, rebuke me not in thy wrath: neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.

verses.plain: For thine arrows stick fast in me, and thy hand presseth me sore.

tokens.t: For thine arrows stick fast in me, and thy hand presseth me sore.

verses.plain: There is no soundness in my flesh because of thine anger; neither is there any rest in my bones because of my sin.

tokens.t: no soundness in my flesh because of thine anger; neither
rest in my bones because of my sin.

verses.plain: For mine iniquities are gone over mine head: as an heavy burden they are too heavy for me.

tokens.t: For mine iniquities are gone over mine head: as an heavy burden they are too heavy for me.

verses.plain: My wounds stink and are corrupt because of my foolishness.

tokens.t: My wounds stink
are corrupt because of my foolishness.

verses.plain: I am troubled; I am bowed down greatly; I go mourning all the day long.

tokens.t: I am troubled; I am bowed down greatly; I go mourning all the day long.

verses.plain: For my loins are filled with a loathsome disease: and there is no soundness in my flesh.

tokens.t: For my loins are filled with a loathsome
and
no soundness in my flesh.

verses.plain: I am feeble and sore broken: I have roared by reason of the disquietness of my heart.

tokens.t: I am feeble and sore broken: I have roared by reason of the disquietness of my heart.

verses.plain: Lord, all my desire is before thee; and my groaning is not hid from thee.

tokens.t: Lord, all my desire
before thee; and my groaning is not hid from thee.

verses.plain: My heart panteth, my strength faileth me: as for the light of mine eyes, it also is gone from me.

tokens.t: My heart panteth, my strength faileth me: as for the light of mine eyes, it also is gone from me.

verses.plain: My lovers and my friends stand aloof from my sore; and my kinsmen stand afar off.

tokens.t: My lovers and my friends stand aloof from my sore; and my kinsmen stand afar off.

verses.plain: They also that seek after my life lay snares for me: and they that seek my hurt speak mischievous things, and imagine deceits all the day long.

tokens.t: They also that seek after my life lay snares
and they that seek my hurt speak mischievous things, and imagine deceits all the day long.

verses.plain: But I, as a deaf man, heard not; and I was as a dumb man that openeth not his mouth.

tokens.t: But I, as a deaf
, heard not; and
as a dumb man
openeth not his mouth.

verses.plain: Thus I was as a man that heareth not, and in whose mouth are no reproofs.

tokens.t: Thus I was as a man that heareth not, and in whose mouth
no reproofs.

verses.plain: For in thee, O LORD, do I hope: thou wilt hear, O Lord my God.

tokens.t: For in thee, O
, do I hope: thou wilt hear, O Lord my God.

verses.plain: For I said, Hear me, lest otherwise they should rejoice over me: when my foot slippeth, they magnify themselves against me.

tokens.t: For I said,
, lest
they should rejoice over me: when my foot slippeth, they magnify
against me.

verses.plain: For I am ready to halt, and my sorrow is continually before me.

tokens.t: For I
ready to halt, and my sorrow
continually before me.

verses.plain: For I will declare mine iniquity; I will be sorry for my sin.

tokens.t: For I will declare mine iniquity; I will be sorry for my sin.

verses.plain: But mine enemies are lively, and they are strong: and they that hate me wrongfully are multiplied.

tokens.t: But mine enemies
lively,
they are strong: and they that hate me wrongfully are multiplied.

verses.plain: They also that render evil for good are mine adversaries; because I follow the thing that good is.

tokens.t: They also that render evil for good are mine adversaries; because I follow
good

verses.plain: Forsake me not, O LORD: O my God, be not far from me.

tokens.t: Forsake me not, O
: O my God, be not far from me.

verses.plain: Make haste to help me, O Lord my salvation.

tokens.t: Make haste to help me, O Lord my salvation.

footnotes.text: is gone…: Heb. is not with me
in…: or, thee do I wait for
are lively…: Heb. being living, are strong
